synopsis.text:
Join the journey of four extraordinary high school students - Hibiki Morishima, Kana Fujii, Reimi Itsushiro, and Sonia Yanagi - as they discover their unique ability to heal the world through the power of their voices. In a world where 'vocal medicine' is a recognized discipline, these young individuals train rigorously to become 'healers,' using their singing talents to mend hearts and cure ailments.

At the prestigious Karasuma Phoniatric Clinic, the trio of Kana, Reimi, and Hibiki, each with their distinct personalities, hone their skills under the watchful guidance of their mentor, Ria Karasuma. Inspired by a life-altering experience, Kana, a gifted singer, leads the group alongside the determined Reimi and the laid-back Hibiki. Together, they encounter a diverse array of healers, learning that the path to mastering vocal medicine is filled with more than just textbook knowledge.

Embark on this melodious adventure as these young healers-in-training strive to bring kindness and miracles to the world, one song at a time. Prepare to be captivated by their heartwarming journey and inspired by the power of music to heal and transform lives.
